text: alegalu, capparagalante avugalannu (hadagugalannu) avarisikondaga, avaru bhaktiyannu allahanobbanige misalagittu avanannu prarthisuttare. Konege avanu avarannu raksisi dada serisidaga avarallobbanu tatasthanagi biduttane. Vacanabhrasta krtaghnara horatu beraru nam'ma puravegala kuritu jagaladuvudilla
